item.title: Reminder
item.description: Hey guys, I’m back and sorry for the inconvenience but I will be posting weekly now cause there is too much to write in one day so yeah. Now, Chapter one of Ghosts will be postponed until next Monday! C’ya! Sorry bout this!

item.title: Ghosts - Introduction
item.description: Hi again and welcome back to day 2 of this blog! After some thinking, I decided to start off with something I’ve longed to write about for quite a long time now. So let’s hop in and start reading! Let’s start off with a bit of info about me! I play Roblox, an online gaming platform and I highly enjoy it. Call me weird or cheezy but hey! It’s what I enjoy!

item.title: Hello
item.description: Hi my name is Sneha! This is my brand new blog where I plan on posting… stuff? I haven’t exactly planned everything out but… hey! The future is later, not now! Anywho, I might write some stories and stuff so yea! Keep on the lookout! I will post everyday… or least I’m planning to! Well, this is all for the opening of my brand new blog site! Now buckle up and enjoy!
